stem: Which leg compartment is most susceptible to acute compartment syndrome according to the overview?
rationale_correct: The handout notes the anterior compartment as most susceptible to compartment syndrome.

rationale_distractors.B: Lateral compartment is less commonly cited in the handout.
rationale_distractors.C: Superficial posterior is not labeled highest risk in the overview.
rationale_distractors.D: Deep posterior is not labeled highest risk in the overview.
rationale_distractors.E: The overview cites the anterior compartment specifically.

evidence.citation: Heck C. Lower Limb Overview Handout â€” Anterior compartment clinical correlate. Jun 16, 2025.
